item.name: Users

request.description:
# Get User Details

This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific user.

## Request

### Endpoint

`GET /users/66c7b52d0e42a9164eb755ac`

## Response

- Status: 200
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "data": {
        "loyaltyPoints": 0,
        "_id": "",
        "name": "",
        "email": "",
        "phoneNumber": "",
        "giftCard": 0,
        "photo": "",
        "role": "",
        "purchaseHistory": [""],
        "active": true,
        "verified": true,
        "createdAt": "",
        "updatedAt": "",
        "__v": 0,
        "shoppingCart": "",
        "isNotificationMuted": true,
        "isPrimeUser": true,
        "lastPrimeSubscriptionDocument": "",
        "primeSubscriptionStatus": ""
    }
}

 ```

## Headers

No specific headers are required for this request.

### Delete User

This endpoint is used to delete a specific user by providing the user ID in the URL.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

- Status: 204
- Content-Type: text/xml
- The response body is empty (null).

### Activate User

This endpoint is used to activate a specific user.

#### Request Body

- No request body is required for this endpoint.
    

#### Response

- **status**: (string) The status of the activation process.
- **data**: (object) Additional data related to the activation process.
    

Example Response:

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "data": null
}

 ```

# Get Users by Role

This endpoint retrieves users with a specific role.

## Request

### URL

`GET /users?role=admin`

## Response

- Status: 200
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "results": 0,
    "data": [
        {
            "isPrimeUser": true,
            "loyaltyPoints": 0,
            "_id": "",
            "name": "",
            "email": "",
            "phoneNumber": "",
            "giftCard": 0,
            "photo": "",
            "role": "",
            "purchaseHistory": [""],
            "active": true,
            "verified": true,
            "createdAt": "",
            "updatedAt": "",
            "emailVerificationToken": "",
            "shoppingCart": "",
            "isNotificationMuted": true
        }
    ]
}

 ```

# Update User Password

This endpoint is used to update the password for the currently authenticated user.

## Request

- Method: PATCH
- URL: {{URL}}/users/me/password
- Headers:
    - Content-Type: application/json
- Body (raw, JSON):
    
    ``` json
    {
        "currentPassword": "",
        "newPassword": "",
        "passwordConfirmation": ""
    }
    
     ```
    

## Response

- Status: 200
- Content-Type: application/json
- Body:
    
    ``` json
    {
        "status": "",
        "token": "",
        "data": {
            "user": {
                "_id": "",
                "name": "",
                "email": "",
                "phoneNumber": "",
                "giftCard": 0,
                "photo": "",
                "password": "",
                "role": "",
                "purchaseHistory": [""],
                "active": true,
                "verified": true,
                "createdAt": "",
                "updatedAt": "",
                "__v": 0,
                "shoppingCart": "",
                "isNotificationMuted": true,
                "isPrimeUser": true,
                "lastPrimeSubscriptionDocument": "",
                "primeSubscriptionStatus": "",
                "myShop": "",
                "loyaltyPoints": 0
            }
        }
    }
    
     ```

The endpoint retrieves the details of the authenticated user.

The response is a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "data": {
        "_id": "",
        "name": "",
        "email": "",
        "phoneNumber": "",
        "giftCard": 0,
        "photo": "",
        "role": "",
        "purchaseHistory": [""],
        "active": true,
        "verified": true,
        "createdAt": "",
        "updatedAt": "",
        "__v": 0,
        "shoppingCart": "",
        "isNotificationMuted": true,
        "isPrimeUser": true,
        "lastPrimeSubscriptionDocument": "",
        "primeSubscriptionStatus": "",
        "myShop": "",
        "loyaltyPoints": 0
    }
}

 ```

### Delete User Profile

This endpoint is used to delete the user's own profile.

#### Request Body

This request does not require a request body.

#### Response

- `status`: Indicates the status of the request, where a successful deletion would return a status code of 200.
- `message`: A message confirming the successful deletion of the user profile.

### Deactivate Current User

This endpoint is used to deactivate the current user.

#### Request

- Method: `PATCH`
- URL: `{{URL}}/users/me/deactivate`
    

#### Request Body

- No request body is required for this endpoint.
    

#### Response

The response for this request is a JSON object with the following schema:

``` json
{
  "status": "string",
  "message": "string"
}

 ```

- `status` (string) - The status of the deactivation request.
- `message` (string) - A message indicating the result of the deactivation process.

### Update User Information

This endpoint is used to update the information of the currently authenticated user.

#### Request Body
- `active` (boolean): Indicates whether the user is active.
- `password` (string): The new password for the user.
- `role` (string): The role of the user.

#### Response
The response will contain the updated user information.

item.name: Convert loyalty points to gift cart balance

item.description:
This collection contains API endpoints related to user management and operations. It is divided into two main categories: admin end points and user end points.

## Structure

The collection is organized as follows:

- Users  
    
    - Admin Operations
        
    - User Operations

request.description:
The endpoint retrieves a list of products from the server.

The response schema for the request is as follows:

```json
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "status": {"type": "string"},
        "results": {"type": "integer"},
        "data": {
            "type": "array",
            "items": {
                "type": "object",
                "properties": {
                    "_id": {"type": "string"},
                    "sourceType": {"type": "string"},
                    "shopId": {"type": "string"},
                    "name": {"type": "string"},
                    "description": {"type": "string"},
                    "category": {"type": "string"},
                    "brand": {"type": "string"},
                    "price": {"type": "number"},
                    "discount": {"type": "number"},
                    "discountCodes": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                    "stock_quantity": {"type": "integer"},
                    "images": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                    "videos": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                    "color": {"type": "string"},
                    "material": {"type": "string"},
                    "averageRating": {"type": "number"},
                    "totalReviews": {"type": "integer"},
                    "shipping_methods": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                    "availability_status": {"type": "string"},
                    "manufacturer": {"type": "string"},
                    "freezed": {"type": "boolean"},
                    "return_policy": {"type": "string"},
                    "createdAt": {"type": "string"},
                    "updatedAt": {"type": "string"}
                }
            }
        }
    }
}
```

body.raw:
{

}

request.description:
### POST /products

This endpoint is used to create a new product.

#### Request Body

- `name` (string, required): The name of the product.
- `description` (string, required): A brief description of the product.
- `category` (string, required): The category to which the product belongs.
- `brand` (string, required): The brand of the product.
- `price` (number, required): The price of the product.
- `discount` (number, required): The discount on the product.
- `discountCodes` (array of strings, required): The discount codes applicable to the product.
- `stock_quantity` (number, required): The available quantity of the product in stock.
- `images` (array of strings, required): URLs of the images of the product.
- `videos` (array of strings, required): URLs of the videos of the product.
- `color` (string, required): The color of the product.
- `material` (string, required): The material used in the product.
- `averageRating` (number, required): The average rating of the product.
- `totalReviews` (number, required): The total number of reviews for the product.
- `shipping_cost` (number, required): The shipping cost of the product.
- `shipping_methods` (array of strings, required): The available shipping methods for the product.
- `availability_status` (string, required): The availability status of the product.
- `manufacturer` (string, required): The manufacturer of the product.
- `supplier` (string, required): The supplier of the product.
- `return_policy` (string, required): The return policy for the product.
- `freezed` (boolean, required): Indicates if the product is freezed.
- `createdAt` (string, required): The date and time when the product was created.
- `updatedAt` (string, required): The date and time when the product was last updated.
    

#### Response (201 - Created)

The response is in JSON format and follows the schema below:

``` json
{
  "type": "object",
  "properties": {
    "status": { "type": "string" },
    "data": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "sourceType": { "type": "string" },
        "name": { "type": "string" },
        "description": { "type": "string" },
        "category": { "type": "string" },
        "brand": { "type": "string" },
        "price": { "type": "number" },
        "discount": { "type": "number" },
        "discountCodes": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } },
        "stock_quantity": { "type": "number" },
        "images": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } },
        "videos": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } },
        "color": { "type": "string" },
        "material": { "type": "string" },
        "averageRating": { "type": "number" },
        "totalReviews": { "type": "number" },
        "shipping_cost": { "type": "number" },
        "shipping_methods": { "type": "array", "items": { "type": "string" } },
        "availability_status": { "type": "string" },
        "manufacturer": { "type": "string" },
        "supplier": { "type": "string" },
        "freezed": { "type": "boolean" },
        "return_policy": { "type": "string" },
        "_id": { "type": "string" },
        "createdAt": { "type": "string" },
        "updatedAt": { "type": "string" },
        "__v": { "type": "number" }
      }
    }
  }
}

 ```

### PATCH /products/66f27e34928623602137fa3e

This endpoint is used to update a specific product with the provided ID.

#### Request Body

- `name` (string, required): The updated name of the product.
    

#### Response

The response will be in JSON format with the following schema:

``` json
{
    "type": "object",
    "properties": {
        "status": {"type": "string"},
        "data": {
            "type": "object",
            "properties": {
                "_id": {"type": "string"},
                "sourceType": {"type": "string"},
                "name": {"type": "string"},
                "description": {"type": "string"},
                "category": {"type": "string"},
                "brand": {"type": "string"},
                "price": {"type": "number"},
                "discount": {"type": "number"},
                "discountCodes": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                "stock_quantity": {"type": "number"},
                "images": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                "videos": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                "color": {"type": "string"},
                "material": {"type": "string"},
                "averageRating": {"type": "number"},
                "totalReviews": {"type": "number"},
                "shipping_cost": {"type": "number"},
                "shipping_methods": {"type": "array", "items": {"type": "string"}},
                "availability_status": {"type": "string"},
                "manufacturer": {"type": "string"},
                "supplier": {"type": "string"},
                "freezed": {"type": "boolean"},
                "return_policy": {"type": "string"},
                "createdAt": {"type": "string"},
                "updatedAt": {"type": "string"},
                "__v": {"type": "number"}
            }
        }
    }
}

 ```

### Get Product Details
This endpoint retrieves the details of a specific product by its ID.

#### Request
- Method: GET
- URL: `{{URL}}/products/66ad32a45ef7087659c3cd78`

#### Response
- Status: 200
- Content-Type: application/json
- Body:
  ```json
  {
    "status": "",
    "data": {
      "_id": "",
      "sourceType": "",
      "shopId": "",
      "name": "",
      "description": "",
      "category": "",
      "brand": "",
      "price": 0,
      "discount": 0,
      "discountCodes": [],
      "stock_quantity": 0,
      "images": [],
      "videos": [],
      "color": "",
      "material": "",
      "averageRating": 0,
      "totalReviews": 0,
      "shipping_methods": [""],
      "availability_status": "",
      "manufacturer": "",
      "freezed": true,
      "return_policy": "",
      "createdAt": "",
      "updatedAt": "",
      "__v": 0
    }
  }
  ```

### DELETE /products/66f27e34928623602137fa3e

This endpoint is used to delete a specific product with the given ID.

#### Request Body

This endpoint does not require a request body.

#### Response

- Status: 204
- Content-Type: text/xml
    

The response for this request does not include a body.

#### JSON Schema

``` json
{}

 ```

item.name: Get all reviews related to  product

request.description:
This endpoint makes an HTTP GET request to verify the email using the provided verification token. The response will be in JSON format with a status and message field.

### Request

- No request body is required for this request.

### Response

- `status` (string): The status of the email verification.
- `message` (string): Any additional message related to the email verification process.

This endpoint retrieves the shopping cart details for the currently authenticated user.

### Request

- Method: `GET`
- URL: `{{URL}}/shopping-cart/me`
    

### Response

- Status: 200 OK
- Content-Type: application/json
    

``` json
{
    "status": "",
    "data": {
        "_id": "",
        "user": "",
        "items": [],
        "total_quantity": 0,
        "discount_code_applied": true,
        "total_discount": 0,
        "total_price": 0,
        "total_shipping_cost": 0,
        "payment_status": "",
        "payment_method": "",
        "createdAt": "",
        "updatedAt": "",
        "__v": 0
    }
}

 ```

The API endpoint sends an HTTP DELETE request to remove a specific item from the shopping cart.

### Response

The response for this request can be documented as a JSON schema. The schema will define the structure of the response data returned by the API endpoint.
